name: Fable of Griselda
description:
What if the Legend of Zelda had been made as an ASCII game? By someone who only had pictures of the original game? And who didn't speak English very well?

Well, now you can find out the answer to these burning questions by playing Fable of Griselda!

This game was originally created for the Bootleg Demake competition on tigsource in 2008. It was later ported to be a web application in 2020.
